mozilla.org

We're proud to announce that the 2012/13 Knight-Mozilla Fellowships are now accepting applications. If you're a developer or technologist interested in spending 10 months in some of the best newsrooms in the world creating innovative new approaches to the news, now is the time to apply!

What is OpenNews?

Knight-Mozilla OpenNews is about building an ecosystem to help journalism thrive on the open web. It's about producing next-generation web solutions that solve real problems in news. It's about supporting communities of developers and journalists as they make, learn and invent together. And it's about deploying fellows—and code—into news organizations to collaborate and innovate in new ways. Join us!

Fellowships

Our 2012/13 Knight-Mozilla Fellows will be embedded in partner newsrooms around the world to spend the year writing innovative code to transform journalism on the web. Learn more.

Hack days

We are sponsoring hack days across the globe to write code and build community and momentum around solving real-world journalistic problemsets. Get involved.

Community

The hacker-journalist community is a vibrant one, and all our initiatives are designed to help it grow in size as well as strength. We want to engage the community at every step, that means we need your help. Here's how.

Get Involved

The success of OpenNews depends on people like you! Sign up with the forms below to learn more:

  • Become a 2012/13 Fellow
  • Hold a Journalism Hack Day
  • Join the Community

Meet the 2011/12
Knight-Mozilla Fellows

Our 2011/12 Knight-Mozilla Fellows are hacking the news at the BBC, the Guardian, Zeit Online, Al Jazeera English, and the Boston Globe. Learn more about their experience.

About Knight

Knight Foundation supports transformational ideas that promote quality journalism, advance media innovation, engage communities and foster the arts. The foundation believes that democracy thrives when people and communities are informed and engaged.

For more, visit knightfoundation.org

About Mozilla

Mozilla is a global non-profit dedicated to putting you in control of your online experience and shaping the future of the web for the public good—by creating great software and fostering communities that build and grow the open web.

Sign up to hear more, and, if you're willing, please join Mozilla.
